sql.pptn_select_sql: SELECT STCD, TM, DRP, INTV FROM "TEST"."ST_PPTN_R" WHERE TM > :f1<char[32]> AND TM <= :f2<char[32]> ;
sql.stbprp_select_sql: SELECT  STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAzt, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1 FROM "TEST"."ST_STBPRP_B";
